original: Atthi arahato rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṁ kāmarāgasaṁyojanaṁ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?
analyzed: atthi arahataḥ rāgo kāma rāgo kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhānam kāma rāga sayojanam kāmogho kāma yogo kāmacchanda nīvaraṇanti

original: Arahā arahattā parihāyamāno kiṁ pariyuṭṭhito parihāyatīti?
analyzed: arahā arahattā parihāyamāno kim pariyuṭṭhitaḥ parihāyati iti

original: Atthi arahato kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayoti?
analyzed: atthi arahato kāma rāga anusayo paṭigha anusayo māna anusayo diṭṭha anusayaḥ vicikicchā anusayaḥ bhava rāga anusayaḥ avijjā anusayo ti
atthi arahato kāma rāga anusayo pe

original: Arahato arahattā parihāyamānassa kiṁ upacayaṁ gacchatīti?
analyzed: arahataḥ arahattā parihāyamānassa kim upacayam gacchati iti

original: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi upacayaṁ gacchatīti, vicikicchā upacayaṁ gacchatīti, sīlabbataparāmāso upacayaṁ gacchatīti?
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhi upacayam gacchati iti vicikicchā upacayam gacchati iti sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ upacayam gacchati iti

original: moho upacayaṁ gacchatīti, sakkāyadiṭṭhi upacayaṁ gacchatīti, vicikicchā upacayaṁ gacchatīti, sīlabbataparāmāso upacayaṁ gacchatīti?
analyzed: mohaḥ upacayam gacchati iti sakkāya diṭṭhi upacayam gacchati iti vicikicchā upacayam gacchati iti sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ upacayam gacchati iti

original: Nanu arahā nevācinati na apacinati apacinitvā ṭhitoti?
analyzed: nanu arahā na iva ācinati na apacinati apacinitvā

original: Hañci arahā nevācinati na apacinati apacinitvā ṭhito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci arahā na iva ācinati na apacinati apacinitvā ṭhitaḥ no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu arahā neva pajahati na upādiyati pajahitvā ṭhitoti?
analyzed: nanu arahā na iva pajahati na upādiyati pajahitvā ṭhitā uti

original: Hañci arahā neva pajahati na upādiyati pajahitvā ṭhito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci arahā na iva pajahati na upādiyati pajahitvā ṭhitaḥ no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu arahā neva visineti na ussineti visinitvā ṭhitoti?
analyzed: nanu arahā na iva visineti na ussineti visinitvā ṭhitaḥ uti

original: Hañci arahā neva visineti na ussineti visinitvā ṭhito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci arahā na iva visineti na ussineti visinitvā ṭhitaḥ no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu arahā neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhitoti?
analyzed: nanu arahā na iva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhitā uti

original: Hañci arahā neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci arahā na iva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhitaḥ no ca vata re vattabbe
